title: Stargazers
description: Detailed information about GitHub users who have starred a repository

id.description: The unique identifier of the user

node_id.description: The Node ID of the user

avatar_url.description: The URL of the user's avatar image

gravatar_id.description: The Gravatar ID associated with the user

url.description: The API URL for the user

html_url.description: The GitHub URL for the user

followers_url.description: The API URL for the user's followers

following_url.description: The API URL template for users being followed

gists_url.description: The API URL template for user's gists

starred_url.description: The API URL template for repositories starred by the user

subscriptions_url.description: The API URL for repositories the user is watching

organizations_url.description: The API URL for organizations the user belongs to

repos_url.description: The API URL for the user's repositories

events_url.description: The API URL template for user's events

received_events_url.description: The API URL for events received by the user

site_admin.description: Whether the user is a GitHub site admin

starred_at.description: The timestamp when the user starred the repository

user_view_type.description: The visibility type of the user
